price: (Djajtë nuk përgjojnë dot), veç atij që grabit diçka e që e ndjek një yll verbues.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ ٱلۡخَطۡفَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ ثَاقِبٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: illā man khaṭifa al-khaṭfata fa-atbaʿahu shihābun thāqibun
